headline: Is Resilient Multi‑Asset AUM Growth Altering The Investment Case For T. Rowe Price Group (TROW)?
summary: T. Rowe Price Group recently reported that its assets under management reached US$1.80 trillion in January 2026, up from US$1.78 trillion a year earlier, with multi-asset strategies contributing most of the increase despite prior-year net outflows and ongoing active-management headwinds. The update has sharpened attention on how T. Rowe Price’s scale in retirement and multi-asset solutions could underpin its role as an income-oriented, active manager amid fee pressure and competition from...

headline: Rowe Price Group, Inc. (TROW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on T. Rowe Price Group, Inc. on CompoundingLab’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TROW. T. Rowe Price Group, Inc.’s share was trading at $94.36 as of February 19th. TROW’s trailing and forward P/E were 10.15 and 9.23 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Rowe Price Group, Inc. is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm provides its services to individuals, institutional investors, retirement plans, financial intermediaries

headline: T. Rowe Price (TROW) Valuation Check After Resilient AUM And Multi Asset Growth
summary: T. Rowe Price Group (TROW) recently reported January 2026 assets under management of US$1.797b, compared with US$1.776b a year earlier, with multi asset portfolios at US$646b versus US$627b. See our latest analysis for T. Rowe Price Group. Despite the latest AUM update and recent conference and podcast activity, T. Rowe Price Group’s share price has been under pressure, with a 30 day share price return of 10.09% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 5.74%. If this has you reassessing where...
